Class AccountDatabase

java.lang.Object
AccountDatabase
public class AccountDatabase extends Object
A class that holds and organizes all the bank accounts in the database.
Author:
Tyler Sarno, Aum Pathak.

  • Method Details

    • find

      private int find(Account account)
      Searches the database to see if there is a duplicate account.
      Parameters:
      account - the account you are searching for.
      Returns:
      returns -1 if no duplicate has been found, returns the index of the dupe account otherwise.

    • getNumAcct

      public int getNumAcct()
      getter method for numAcct
      Returns:
      int (the number of accounts).

    • getAccounts

      public Account[] getAccounts()
      getter method for accounts.
      Returns:
      the accounts array.

    • grow

      private void grow()
      if the database array has reached capacity, expand it by 4 slots.

    • open

      public boolean open(Account account)
      open an account and add it to the database.
      Parameters:
      account - the account you want to add.
      Returns:
      return true if acc opening successful, false otherwise.

    • close

      public boolean close(Account account)
      Method to close an account.
      Parameters:
      account - the account that needs to be closed
      Returns:
      false if no account present. Else, true once the account is closed

    • deposit

      public void deposit(Account account)
      deposit money into an account.
      Parameters:
      account - the account you want to deposit money into.

    • withdraw

      public boolean withdraw(Account account)
      withdraw money from an account.
      Parameters:
      account - the account you are withdrawing from.
      Returns:
      return true if the withdrawal was successful, false otherwise.

    • print

      public void print()
      print all the accounts in the database.

    • sortDatabase

      private void sortDatabase()
      method that sorts the database for printing (uses insertion sort).

    • printByAccountType

      public void printByAccountType()
      print all the accounts in the database organized by the type.

    • printFeeAndInterest

      public void printFeeAndInterest()
      prints all accounts along with their fees and monthly interest.

    • printUpdatedBalances

      public void printUpdatedBalances()
      Update the balance of all the accounts in the database (that aren't closed).
